T08D4118:259a-27: bu stegs gnas dang mtshams dgrol dang //

T08D4118:259a-29: de nyid tshol du gzhug pa dang //
T08D4118:259a-30: bsgo bar bya ba rnams dang ni //
T08D4118:259a-31: nyams pa sbyin par bya ba dang //
T08D4118:259a-32: gsol dang bzhi yi las yin no ;
T08D4118:259a-34: 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul
T08D4118:259a-35: ba 'dzin pa chen po bram ze'i btsun pa slob
T08D4118:259a-36: dpon yon tan 'od bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i
T08D4118:259a-37: mthar rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa /
T08D4118:259a-38: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba bdud rtsi'i nying
T08D4118:259a-39: khus shes rab kyi dbang po rgyas pa bde bar
T08D4118:259a-40: gshegs pa'i bka' dam pa nan tan snying por bsgrubs
T08D4118:259a-41: pa / sde pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i sde snod mtha' dag gi gtso bor gyur pa /
T08D4118:259a-42: 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba kun las btus ba rdzogs so /
T08D4118:259a-44: // / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan
T08D4118:259a-45: po'i bka' lung gis 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod
T08D4118:259a-46: par smra ba'i 'dul pa 'dzin pa kha che'i bye
T08D4118:259a-47: brag tu sma ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra
T08D4118:259a-48: dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande klu'i
T08D4118:259a-49: rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
T08D4118:259a-50: dang / pa / 'di la shlo ka ni sum stong bdun brgya yod /
